Key Arguments: The legislation is an overreach of government power and infringes on freedom of speech.
The proposed control over misinformation is likened to oppressive regimes, such as communism.
The COVID-19 pandemic response by the government was excessive and comparable to authoritarian practices.
The individual expresses concern over potential future government control, such as a social credit system.
There is a call for a Bill of Rights in Australia to protect freedom of speech and privacy.
Notable Quotes: People have the right to express their views and opinions no matter how differing the opinion may be. That is democracy.
I came to Australia to live in a democratic country and now Australia has become worse than the Communist regime that I left.
We actually need a Bill of rights in Australia like in America, not more control from the government.
